Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in Changed element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in CredentialState element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in tns1:Configuration element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in the same element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in the MessageDescription element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: namespase is defined in Source element
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: doesn't support topic CredentialState/Changed
Test.Description: 5. If topicSet does not contain tns1:Configuration/CredentialState/Changed topic, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.Name: Correct response: IsProperty attribute skipped
Test.Description: Check CREDENTIAL-8-1-1 STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: IsProperty = true
Test.Description: 6.1. If ChangedTopic.MessageDescription.IsProperty equals to true, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: element Source.SimpleItemDescription has wrong Name
Test.Description: 6.2. If ChangedTopic does not contain MessageDescription.Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Name =: “CredentialToken”, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: element Source.SimpleItemDescription has wrong Type
Test.Description: 6.3. If ChangedTopic.MessageDescription.Source.SimpleItemDescription with Name =: “CredentialToken” does not have Type =: “pt:ReferenceToken”, FAIL the test and skip other steps.
